document.docTitle: Neocarus bajacalifornicus subsp. chamelaensis Vazquez & Klompen 2009

Other paratypes at OSAL , UQROO
.
Etymology: The subspecific name is derived from the primary collection locality, Estacion de Biologia de Chamela.
